title: (x) Capristo techno-style logo - Axaxax {Angel}
content:
Hi,

I’m thinking this may be a custom typeface but I’m not sure.  
I was unable to find the logo on brandsoftheworld.com but I will need to geta vector version of this logo for a supplier of this product.

If this is just a standard typeface, awesome. Will make things easy.

What type would the “Capristo” text be?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704151015im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/capristo_4582.gif)

Thanks

 [‹ (x) Heavy square sans in Scratch Magazine - Register {Stephen}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704151015/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33315 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Cuba decorative face on poster - Motter Ombra {David H} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704151015/http:/www.typophile.com/node/30296 "Go to next forum topic")
author: retoid

comments.content: Bryan, I should point out that the logo was probably created with an earlier version of Ax. See [themeworld](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704151015/http:/www.themeworld.com/cgi-bin/preview.pl/fonts/axaxax.0.zip).
stephen, you’re on a roll today ;)
